title: Estimation of partially known Gaussian graphical models with score-based structural priors. (arXiv:2401.14340v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: We propose a novel algorithm for the support estimation of partially known Gaussian graphical models that incorporates prior information about the underlying graph. In contrast to classical approaches that provide a point estimate based on a maximum likelihood or a maximum a posteriori criterion using (simple) priors on the precision matrix, we consider a prior on the graph and rely on annealed Langevin diffusion to generate samples from the posterior distribution. Since the Langevin sampler requires access to the score function of the underlying graph prior, we use graph neural networks to effectively estimate the score from a graph dataset (either available beforehand or generated from a known distribution). Numerical experiments demonstrate the benefits of our approach.

translated_title: 基于得分结构先验的部分已知高斯图模型估计
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种新的算法，用于支持估计部分已知的高斯图模型，并且结合了关于底层图的先验信息。与传统方法相比，传统方法使用点估计方法基于最大似然或最大后验准则，并使用（简单的）精度矩阵先验来提供点估计。我们考虑对图进行先验，并依赖退火朗格维能扩散从后验分布中生成样本。由于朗格维能采样器需要访问底层图先验的得分函数，因此我们使用图神经网络来有效地从图数据集（事先可用或从已知分布生成）估计得分。数值实验证明了我们方法的优势。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种基于得分结构先验的算法，用于估计部分已知高斯图模型。通过使用图神经网络来估计图的得分函数，我们可以在生成样本时利用退火朗格维能扩散，从而更准确地估计后验分布。数值实验表明，我们的方法具有明显的优势。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an algorithm based on score-based structural priors for the estimation of partially known Gaussian graphical models. By using graph neural networks to estimate the score function of the graph, we can utilize annealed Langevin diffusion to generate samples and provide a more accurate estimation of the posterior distribution. Numerical experiments demonstrate the superiority of our approach.
